screener.introduction: Hello, my name is [Name] from [Company]. Today we're talking to people between the ages of 18 and 54 about various products used in the household and I'd like to ask you a few questions.

questions.question: First of all, are you between the ages of 18 and 54?
And are you between 18 and 34, or 35 and 54 years of age?
I'm going to read you a list of products. For each one I read, please tell me if you yourself use the product.
Since we're talking to people all across the country, we're interested in talking to a cross-section of people in different occupations. What is your occupation?
questions.note: WRITE IN FULL TITLE. IF RESPONDENT GIVES A GENERAL OCCUPATION SUCH AS SALES OR MANUFACTURING, ASK: What products are involved in your occupation? TERMINATE IF RESPONDENT ANSWERS 'CIGARETTES'.

questions.question: What is the occupation of your spouse?
questions.note: WRITE IN FULL TITLE. ASK: What products are involved in your spouse's occupation? TERMINATE IF RESPONDENT ANSWERS 'CIGARETTES'.
